# GitHub Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific files and workflows.

## Documentation

All documentation is consolidated in the root directory:

- **[README.md](../README.md)** - Complete project documentation (features, usage, FAQ, everything!)
- **[CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md)** - Version history and release notes
- **[CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - Contribution guidelines
- **[scripts/README.md](../scripts/README.md)** - Release scripts documentation

## Workflows

- **[release.yml](workflows/release.yml)** - Automated multi-platform releases on tag push

## For Contributors

1. Read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines
2. Review [CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md) for recent changes
3. Check [README.md](../README.md) FAQ for common questions

## For Users

Everything you need is in [README.md](../README.md) - installation, usage, patterns, FAQ, and more!
